>spin cre
You give the roulette wheel within the quartz stone credenza a spin, which causes the silver ball to roll around the outer ring of the wheel.  As the roulette wheel begins slowing down, the silver ball clangs over several numbered slots.  Once the wheel comes to a stop, the ball settles on zero.
Roundtime: 2 sec.
R>recite zero, higher or lower?
You recite:

  "Zero, higher or lower?"

Ordim exclaims, "Higher!"
Ordim lets out a cheer!
>spin cre
Hazado laughs!
You give the roulette wheel within the quartz stone credenza a spin, which causes the silver ball to roll around the outer ring of the wheel.  As the roulette wheel begins slowing down, the silver ball clangs over several numbered slots.  Once the wheel comes to a stop, the ball settles on double zero.
Roundtime: 2 sec.
Ordim gasps.
>gasp
You gasp.

You look at a blue quartz stone credenza with a detailed relief of a hunting owl on the surface and cheer!
>pre 715
You trace a burning rune into the air, melding the spiritual and elemental powers by sheer force of will into Curse.
Your spell is ready.
Roblar releases a slow, low whistle.
The sentry shifts her position slightly as she watches people come and go.
Roblar rubs Ordim.
Ordim giggles.
>curse ordim nightmare 12

  Warding failed!
